== About Me ==
Hi, my name is Hui Wang (https://launchpad.net/~hui.wang). I am a member of the <nowiki>[[KernelTeam|{{https:--launchpadlibrarian.net-7080714-ubuntu-kernel-team-small.png}}]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[KernelTeam|Ubuntu Kernel Team]]</nowiki> at Canonical.

== What I do ==
I joined the Linux Kernel Team at Canonical in July 2013. During the first 8 years I have been contributing to the Ubuntu PC OEM projects. Then I have been working on HWE IoT kernels.
